page.title: 02Life Style in Clifton
page.content: Clifton is an isolated{farming}hamlet, two km. away from school.An old lady we spoke to told us that when she was young, six butchers , a fishmonger , a co-op , a baker and a hardware salesman visited the{village}regularly using mobile shops.Now only a travelling library visits once a fortnight and a baker delivers three times a week. Clifton had five farms. Recently when one farmer died the house was demolished and the land was divided to make four farms.A bus calls from Doncaster via Edlington at 0830, 1000 and then at 1400. The last bus to return to Clifton leaves at 1800 .There is a{Church}that only opens one Sunday per month.
